title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 423.3 - Client eligibility criteria for preventive services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 423.3 - Client eligibility criteria for preventive services

State Regulations
(a) The eligibility
criteria for mandated preventive services shall be as defined in section
430.9
of this Title, appropriate
provision of mandated preventive services. (b) Non-mandated preventive services may be
provided by a social services district to children and their families when such
services are not provided pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section and the
child is at risk of foster care or returning to foster care or is in foster
care and preventive services would enable the child to be returned home sooner, except that intensive, home-based, family preservation services, as defined in
section
423.2
(b)(17)
of
this Part, or respite care and services for families, as described in Part 435
of this Title, may not be provided as non-mandated preventive
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
423.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
